dcterms:creator: G. Fanelli
J. Gall
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: A dataset acquired with the Microsoft Kinect sensor, containing about 15k frames with RGB and depth maps. It includes head pose annotations for yaw, pitch, and roll angles.
dcterms:title: Biwi Kinect Head Pose

dcterms:creator: T. BaltruË‡saitis
P. Robinson
L.-P. Morency
dcterms:description: A dataset collected using the Microsoft Kinect sensor, containing RGB images and depth maps of about 14k frames, divided into 10 sequences, with ground truth annotations generated using a hardware sensor.
dcterms:title: ICT-3DHP

dcterms:description: A new dataset created by the authors, specifically designed for head center localization, head pose, and shoulder pose estimation in an automotive context. It contains high-resolution depth data with annotations.
dcterms:title: Pandora
